r.d: PhD is a PHP based Docbook renderer aimed to replace Docbook-XSL and various other requirements needed to build the PHP.net documentation.
r.n: - Added PEAR XHTML theme. (Rudy, Christian) - Added support for new elements (Christian) * glossentry * glossdef * glosslist * important * paramdef * personblurb * phrase * prompt * releaseinfo * spanspec * qandadiv - Improved email support (now creates mailto: links). (Christian) - Chunks without xml:id are no longer chunked. (Christian) - Fixed bug#46252 (Class properties links to a function if theres one with the same name). (Hannes) - Fixed bug#46094 (and then from now on italic). (Hannes) - Fixed bug#45071 (Links to require/include(_once) not rendered). (Hannes) - Fixed a bug where it was only possible to pass one parameter to phd.bat. (Kalle) - Fixed a bug where it wasn't possible to have paths with spaces in when using phd.bat. (Kalle) - Fixed xhtml validation issue for itemizedlist. (Christian)
